title: windows.7.x64.ultra.lite.en.us
description:
# ISO SIZE = 1.21 GB

# INSTALLATION SIZE = 4 GB (without pagefile)

# RAM USAGE AT BOOT = 700 MB

#you can burn it on CD = Yes

# INSTALLATION MODE = bootable ONLY (no manual setup, no repair, no upgrade)

# BOOT MODE = BIOS 

# UI LANGUAGE = ENGLISH (can't install other UI Languages)

# REGIONAL SETTINGS = all available (Default: English, changeable)

# ACTIVATED = no,

# KEPT & WORKING = WinSAT, Cursors, USB Mass Storage, 
Autoplay

# REMOVED = Accesibility, Troubleshooting,Windows Sidebar, Mobility Center, Projector, Windows Media Player, Internet explorer, Disk Defragmenter, wordpad, Games (not all), Disk Cleanup, Sounds,
,Wallpapers, Image Acquisition, Themes, Camera, Network Browsing & Sharing,
Connectivity, Speech, Welcome Center, Fax, Windows Defender,
Write, Windows Side Show, Floppy Support, Smart Card
Support, Language Packs (UI only), IIS, Windows Mail, Homegroup,
Security Center, Media Center, Disk Quota, On-Screen Keyboard,
winsxs (some updates might fail), XPS, Tablet PC, System Restore
Powershell,
= Drivers -- Video, Modem, TV Tuner, Network, Printers, Scanners,
Floppy Drive, Smart Card

# TWEAKS = Updates OFF, Firewall ON, My Computer Context Menu Shortcuts,
Windows Indexing Service OFF, UXTheme Patch, Disable Low Disk
Space Warning, Disable Hibernation, Organisation Home

#link of browser on iso = yes 

Keep seeding!!!

The fastest windows 7 so far! 

Don't install any update, because the windows will crash if you install.
